cz.syntea.xdef.sys

Interface ReportWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayReporter, BinReportWriter, FileReportWriter, NullReportWriter

    public interface ReportWriter
    Interface for writing reports to streams of reports.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_REPORTS
      Maximal number of reports reported by checkAndThrow method.

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_REPORTS

        static final int MAX_REPORTS
        Maximal number of reports reported by checkAndThrow method.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • setLanguage

        void setLanguage(java.lang.String language)
        Set language (ISO-639 or ISO-639-2). This method takes an effect only if the reporter output is printed as a text to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        language - language id (ISO-639).

      • putReport

        void putReport(Report report)
        Put the report to the list.
        Parameters:
        report - The report.

      • fatal

        void fatal(java.lang.String id,
           java.lang.String msg,
           java.lang.Object... mod)
        Put fatal item.
        Parameters:
        id - The report id. If id is null the default text is used.
        msg - Default text of report. If id is not found in report files this text is used.
        mod - Message modification parameters.

      • fatal

        void fatal(long registeredID,
           java.lang.Object... mod)
        Put error item.
        Parameters:
        registeredID - registered report id.
        mod - Message modification parameters.

        void string(long registeredID,
            java.lang.Object... mod)
        Put string item.
        Parameters:
        registeredID - registered report id.
        mod - Message modification parameters.

      • getLastErrorReport

        Report getLastErrorReport()
        Get last error report.
        Returns:
        last error report (or null if last report is not available).

      • clearLastErrorReport

        void clearLastErrorReport()
        Clear last error report. If last report has been available it will be erased (i.e. result of getLastReport() will be null. However, the report has already been written to the report file.

      • clearCounters

        void clearCounters()
        Clear counters of fatal errors, errors and warnings.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clear the report file. All report items will be erased from the file. Also last error report is cleared. throws KException if it is not possible to clear reports.

      • size

        int size()
        Get total number of reports.
        Returns:
        The number of generated reports.

      • fatals

        boolean fatals()
        Check if fatal errors were generated.
        Returns:
        true is errors reports are present.

      • errors

        boolean errors()
        Check if errors and/or fatal errors were generated.
        Returns:
        true is errors reports are present.

      • errorWarnings

        boolean errorWarnings()
        Check if warnings and/or errors and/or fatal errors were generated.
        Returns:
        true is warnings or errors reports are present.

      • getFatalErrorCount

        int getFatalErrorCount()
        Get number of fatal items.
        Returns:
        The number of generated fatal errors.

      • getErrorCount

        int getErrorCount()
        Get number of error items.
        Returns:
        The number of errors.

      • getLightErrorCount

        int getLightErrorCount()
        Get number of light error items.
        Returns:
        The number of light errors.

      • getWarningCount

        int getWarningCount()
        Get number of warning items.
        Returns:
        The number of generated warnings.

      • getReportReader

        ReportReader getReportReader()
        Closes the reportWriter and creates report reader for reading created report data. If reader can't be created the SRuntimeException is thrown.
        Returns:
        report reader created from report writer.

      • close

        void close()
        Close report writer.

      • flush

        void flush()
        flush report writer.

      • writeString

        void writeString(java.lang.String str)
        Write string to reporter.
        Parameters:
        str - String to be written.

      • checkAndThrowErrors

        void checkAndThrowErrors()
                  throws SRuntimeException
        Check error reports stored in report writer. Return normally if in no errors are found, otherwise throw exception with list of error messages (max. MAX_REPORTS messages).
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if errors has been generated.

      • checkAndThrowErrorWarnings

        void checkAndThrowErrorWarnings()
                         throws SRuntimeException
        Check if error and warning reports were stored in report writer. Return normally if in no errors or warnings are found, otherwise throw exception with the list of error messages (max. MAX_REPORTS messages).
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - if errors or warnings has been generated.
